Twas a pleasure talking to you. Not everyday you get to talk to someone as hot as you about something as awesome as comic books. Enjoy the Court as soon as you can.
Keep smiling!
She-Hulk sounds fun. I heard Cosmic is good but havent dabbled in Marvel too much. Im looking for a good book or story arch to get me hooked. Suggestions?

The Court of Owls is the beginning of the run. Most of the stories last for two volumes, like you absolute Court. Riddler's story is based in the first year of Batman. The Joker's story technically starts Batman Eternal (which is also Snyder) so you can find out why he is in his current condition but its not too important to know. All in all, yeah. Jump in as you please.
Whats your current read?
Snyder's run at Batman New 52 is brilliant. He is the one who created the Court of Owls and the first two volumes of Batman New 52 are some of the best reads since Frank Miller.
How is All Star Superman? I just got All Star Batman by Scott Snyder and in an interview that book was one of the reason he wanted to make an ASB. So far my book is fantastic.
Never took it as an insult. No worries. Live long and prosper.

I love your dedication. I actually watched the 1920s book one and the casino one. The others I actually guessed by googling "star trek ______ episode" and guessed the cowboy one. I even saw a Shakespearean one I believe?
"Where no one has gone before" was kinda of a stab at other shows and plotlines we have seen tons of times before. Every show goes to a western time, Robin Hood ripoff, or a casino.
Either way, I agree with you.

Started cigarettes: age 14
Started weed: day before I turned 15
Quit cigarettes: 21-23 (took me a while. One thing that helped was after a few days of not smoking, I hung out with my mom who smoked menthol cigarettes. The harshness of the smell of that constantly for a full day made me sick.)
I used to do a bunch of other drugs but quit those as well at around age 25. I am 32 and weed is my only vice. I barely drink. My advice: get good shit and try to use in moderation. The moderation bit is gonna be hard as well as not trying to smoke a cigarette (the smell of a Black N' Mild still gets me) but being only on weed is a lot more chill and open minded then having all that other junk in your system. If you got a hobby, get more involved in it. I make music and there is definitely a difference between getting high and doing it for a long period of time then stopping for cigarette breaks constantly.
TLDR Quit cigs 10 years ago. It was tough but things are now more fun just high.
Good luck.

My collection varies. Animaniacs, Batman, Rick and Morty, Bernie Sanders, Game of Thrones, Hateful 8, etc. I have even painted a Trump pop to look like the Joker. I honestly cannot tell you why. Its feels nostalgic in a way especially the Animaniacs. I got to take a pic with the voices from the show and they are holding up their pops. Maybe its because of my sister's beanie baby collection when we were kids. One of the fun things is the hunt. Its the same reason people collect puzzles or model trains or cat posters.

WRITING.TITLE: Joshua Bell VR is a short and sweet musical experience
WRITING.TEXT: The camera used is amazing. No pixel glitches and even for people watching outside the headset is just as crisp. Joshua Bell is a very talented violinist and when paired up with a great pianist, the Hungarian Dance that they perform is the perfect way to relax and enjoy some classic(al) music. Highly recommend the FREE download.

Bet it All on Black Garlic Burger. You can find black garlic at Central Market or Trader Joes. Its garlic that is fermented to the point it is soft and gooey. Its like garlic dipped in molasses. You make a mayo out of it that is amazing with fries as well as the burger. We also did the Onion Ring Around the Rosemary Burger and the Bleu is the Warmest Burger that were pretty amazing as well.
